page.shortlink: grid component client side ongridrowcheck event
page.description: Fires when the checkbox is checked or unchecked in a Grid Component with a checkbox column.
page.discussion: The *[ui:onGridRowCheck]* event is triggered when the checked state for a checkbox in the Grid Component's checkbox column changes. The checkbox column can be enabled using the *[ui:Has checkbox select column]* property found in the Grid Component *[ui:Properties]*.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: checkboxValue
property.description: Indicates the checkbox state - checked or unchecked. If *[js:checkboxValue]* is true, the checkbox is checked. Otherewise, the checkbox is unchecked.

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
